meanings.definition: Relating to fish or aquatic animals.
meanings.sent1: The aquarium had a variety of piscine creatures swimming gracefully.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the piscine behavior of the goldfish in the pond.
meanings.sent3: The piscine creatures in the lake seemed to be having a fishy conversation.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the scales of a piscine creature in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The piscine world beneath the surface was a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: A swimming pool or other artificial body of water.
meanings.sent1: The hotel had a beautiful piscine for guests to enjoy during their stay.
meanings.sent2: The community center installed a new piscine for the neighborhood to use.
meanings.sent3: The children splashed and played in the piscine on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent4: The shimmering blue water of the piscine beckoned swimmers to dive in.
meanings.sent5: The reflection of the sky in the piscine made it look like a mirror.
